Room.Name: Sandy Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a sandy beach road near the the Nylandian Bay.
Room.LongDescription: Not far to the south is the blue water of a natural deep bay. The Nylandian Bay is a very busy seaport, linking Oceancrest with the rest of the Land of Mordor. The Respitial Sea carries a great deal of the commerce between the city and the rest of the continent, with merchant ships traveling up and down the coast. Of course, such riches as they carry means pirates are also out there. There is a rumor that pirates have sometimes used the grottos and caves near here.
